jobInfo.postDescription:
Qualifications
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science or business administration fields.
• 2+ years implementing in workforce management, HR/Payroll or ERP solutions, ability of
customization or add-on features are preferred.
• Experience with rule-based enterprise application with B/S framework
• Good presentation skills, ability to set customer’s expectation and lead customers to a conclusion.
• Demonstrated communication skills - English written and verbal
• Domain expertise in manufacture, retail
• Java application development experience is a preferred.
• Experienced in reports development SQL Server SSRS tool, or similar tools (e.g.: Crystal)
• Familiar with OS platform, including windows, Linux, Unix.
• Experience with the implementation challenges associated with complex network environments,
including multiple domains, centralized security authentication.
• Ability and willingness to travel up to 50- 75%

Other Qualifications:
- To perform this job successfully, an individual must be a self-starter and be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. 
- The requirements listed above are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required.
- Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
